sn22.122:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn22.122:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami …pe… etadavoca:
sn22.122:1.3: “silavatavuso, sariputta, bhikkhuna katame dhamma yoniso manasikatabba”ti?
sn22.122:1.4: “Silavatavuso, kotthika, bhikkhuna pancupadanakkhandha aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.122:1.7: Silavatavuso, kotthika, bhikkhuna ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.122:1.8: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati yam silava bhikkhu ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotapattiphalam sacchikareyya”ti.
sn22.122:2.1: “Sotapannena panavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.122:2.2: “Sotapannenapi kho, avuso kotthika, bhikkhuna ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.122:2.3: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati yam sotapanno bhikkhu ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadagamiphalam sacchikareyya”ti.
sn22.122:3.1: “Sakadagamina panavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.122:3.2: “Sakadagaminapi kho, avuso kotthika, bhikkhuna ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.122:3.3: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati yam sakadagami bhikkhu ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto anagamiphalam sacchikareyya”ti.
sn22.122:4.1: “Anagamina panavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.122:4.2: “Anagaminapi kho, avuso kotthika, bhikkhuna ime pancupadanakkhandha aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.122:4.3: Thanam kho panetam, avuso, vijjati yam anagami bhikkhu ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto arahattam sacchikareyya”ti.
sn22.122:5.1: “Arahata panavuso sariputta, katame dhamma yoniso manasi katabba”ti?
sn22.122:5.2: “Arahatapi kho, avuso kotthika, ime pancupadanakkhandhe aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato yoniso manasi katabba.
sn22.122:5.3: Natthi, khvavuso, arahato uttari karaniyam katassa va paticayo;
sn22.122:5.4: api ca ime dhamma bhavita bahulikata ditthadhammasukhaviharaya ceva samvattanti satisampajannaya ca”ti.
